SELECT NVL(MAX(SHIP_NO), 0)+1 FROM OR_SHIPMENT
INSERT INTO OR_SHIPMENT ( SHIP_NO, DELIV_NO, EMP_NO, SHIP_DATE, SHIP_P_DATE, SHIP_PROG ) VALUES ( #{ship_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{deliv_no, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{emp_no, jdbcType=CHAR}, NVL(DECODE(#{ship_date},'',SYSDATE,#{ship_date}), SYSDATE), NVL(DECODE(#{ship_p_date},'', SYSDATE, #{ship_p_date}), SYSDATE), 'OR01' )
mapper.update: UPDATE OR_SHIPMENT SET EMP_NO = #{emp_no, jdbcType=CHAR}, SHIP_DATE = NVL(DECODE(#{ship_date}, '', SYSDATE, #{ship_date}), SYSDATE), SHIP_P_DATE = NVL(DECODE(#{ship_p_date}, '', SYSDATE, #{ship_p_date}), SYSDATE), SHIP_PROG = NVL(DECODE(#{ship_prog, jdbcType=CHAR},'', 'OR01', #{ship_prog, jdbcType=CHAR}), 'OR01') WHERE SHIP_NO = #{ship_no}
mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM OR_DELIVERY A LEFT OUTER JOIN OR_SHIPMENT B ON (A.DELIV_NO = B.DELIV_NO) WHERE B.DELIV_NO IS NULL

SELECT S.SHIP_NO, S.DELIV_NO, S.EMP_NO, TO_CHAR(S.SHIP_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') SHIP_DATE, TO_CHAR(S.SHIP_P_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') SHIP_P_DATE, S.SHIP_PROG, E.EMP_NAME, D.DELIV_PROG, O.OR_NO, O.BUYER_NO, O.OR_STATUS, OP.ORP_NO, OP.PROD_NO, OP.ORP_QTY, OP.ORP_PRICE, P.PROD_NAME, P.PROD_STAND_SIZE, B.BUYER_NAME, LP.LPROD_NAME FROM OR_SHIPMENT S LEFT OUTER JOIN OR_DELIVERY D ON(D.DELIV_NO=S.DELIV_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN ORDERP O ON(O.OR_NO=D.OR_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN BUYER B ON(B.BUYER_NO=O.BUYER_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(E.EMP_NO=S.EMP_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN OR_PLIST OP ON(OP.OR_NO=O.OR_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PROD P ON(P.PROD_NO=OP.PROD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN LPROD LP ON(LP.LPROD_NO=P.LPROD_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN OR_RETURN_P RP ON(RP.SHIP_NO=S.SHIP_NO) WHERE D.DELIV_PROG LIKE 'OR02' AND RP.OR_RETP_NO IS NULL ORDER BY SHIP_NO DESC
